title: Forgot your password email not working?
body: So something has happened to my main account (DCarnage). Not sure if it was hacked or banned (not sure why I'm not as toxic as I was in silver 3 years ago). Yesterday I went to log in to play some poro king goodness and my password wasn't working. I'm the type who only uses a set few amount of passwords. I like to keep it simple so it's impossible for me to actually forget any of them. So my immediate response is I was hacked I think... not sure why someone would bother, although the account is an old one since season 1 (shout out to those bronze season 1 cup bois). The account is worth a lot so I would like it back but I don't seem to be receiving the emails for the forgot your password thing. I've submitted a support ticket but being Christmas  I doubt it'll be sorted. Just wondering if anyone else woke up one morning with the same issue or if anyone is receiving those emails and it's something on my end.

replies.body: Did you make sure to check your spam folder for the recovery email?

Yeah I did. I went through the whole blocked senders thing with my email just to make sure. I've been checking every hour or so still nothing. 

Thanks for the reply :)

It's best to submit an Account Recovery ticket if you're not receiving any emails for password recovery! They can look into why you're not getting those emails and hopefully change that information for you :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
